expandable-text__inner-content: Eau de parfum. An elegant and balanced fragrance. The freshness of mandarin and lavender combines with the warmth of cinnamon and vanilla, leaving a captivating and refined trail.

expandable-text__inner-content:
Eau de parfum. Inspired by the deep, warm feeling of a golden sunset, this new, more intense version captures the warmth and addictive facets of fir balsam and labdanum, evoking the mesmerising transition from day to night.

The fragrance pyramid reveals vibrant notes of bergamot and ginger, enhanced by a radiant halo of mandarin. As the fragrance unfolds, the base notes reveal a rich blend of amber, intertwined with the captivating aromas of orange blossom and blackcurrant.

Eau de parfum. An intense new amber take on the original fragrance, which captures the golden nuances of vanilla and amber, embodying the last moments of sunlight before twilight settles over the dunes.

The fragrance pyramid of this enriched version enhances the iconic signature of incense and the blend of orange with cinnamon, tonka bean and chocolate, while the cedarwood and iris are enveloped in a warm embrace of amber and vanilla.

A fragrance that takes the iconic original perfume to a new level of refinement.

The vibrant citrus notes of bergamot and grapefruit contrast with a rich woody and spicy signature that creates a unique and powerful aroma.
Completing this sophisticated essence, a trio of Amber, Tonka and Black Vanilla adds a reinvented addiction, revealing a deeper fascination.

A story of greater intensity, bold sensuality and an irresistible appeal for those who are reshaping the boundaries of masculinity.

expandable-text__inner-content:
A fragrance collection to add the final touch to your outfit, whether elegant, sophisticated or daring. Bringing a dark and intoxicating touch at night, and during the day revealing sparkling and magnetic notes.

NIGHT POUR HOMME II, a modern oriental fougère where seductive and warm spices intermingle with notes of dry woods for an intoxicating scent. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity top notes of bergamot, grapefruit and lemon wrapped in cardamom, lavender and nutmeg. At the base we find musky and vanilla notes accompanied by cedarwood, amber and tonka bean. An evocative fragrance for the man who asserts his free and carefree personality.

NIGHT POUR HOMME III, a woody fragrance that reveals an elegant and fresh character with an iridescent floral explosion. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity notes of bergamot and pear, wrapped in iris, osmanthus, coriander and pepper. At the base we find woody notes of sandalwood and cashmere wood accompanied by notes of leather and vetiver. A unique, seductive and irresistible scent.
Eau de toilette. The fragrance pyramid includes notes of lemon, green accords and musk. It's a fresh, comfortable and sporty fragrance.

expandable-text__inner-content: A set with two woody eaux de parfum. The scent reveals notes of apple, black pepper and tonka bean. It’s an elegant, warm and intense fragrance (I) + notes of rum, white peony and bourbon vanilla. It’s a warm, intense and luminous fragrance (II).
Eau de toilette duo set. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of lemon, jasmine and patchouli (I) + notes of lemon, cinnamon and palo santo (II).

Eau de toilette duo set. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of lemon, jasmine and patchouli. It’s a fresh, modern and luminous fragrance (I) + notes of mandarin, ylang-ylang and amber. It’s a modern, warm evening fragrance (II).
Eau de parfum. A balance between the warmth of woody notes and the intensity of leather. Citrus notes of bergamot and lemon blend with bamboo, leather accords and a base of patchouli and papyrus.
